content.heading: AI-Hub
content.description: AI-Hub is a robust platform designed for container orchestration in GPU enabled environments. It seamlessly handles multi-node operations and accommodates various AI/ML frameworks, ensuring optimal performance and adaptability. AIHub accommodates multiple frameworks and types of workloads, providing a versatile and comprehensive solution for AI/ML Infrastructure needs Implements a customized login page template featuring role categorization for admin, ML ops user, ICME user, each with specific access permissions. Additionally, ensures data integrity by providing role- based access and views tailored for managed customer environments.
